data.title: The Analog Record Series | The Peninsula Tokyo
meta_keywords: The Analog Record Series | The Peninsula Tokyo
data.meta_description: Come to Peter: The Bar and experience 'The Analog Record Series' where we feature a lineup of talented DJs playing exclusively on vinyl every Friday.
data.text:
Join us at Peter: The Bar every Friday for 'The Analog Record Series' where we celebrate the artistry of the DJ and groove to the hits that have shaped Tokyo’s music and vinyl culture through the decades. The series is curated by some of the best vinyl record DJs in the business promising a plethora of funk, hip-hop, soul, R&B, and jazz. This summer especially, we are delighted to welcome DJ TOJO as he brings the electrifying Latin and salsa beats to the table. In addition to the music, we serve award-winning cocktails and delicious bar bites for guests to enjoy.

Time: 8:30 pm - 11:30 pm

Venue: Peter and Peter: The Bar, 24F

Price: No cover charge

Schedule:

July 2024

5th - DJ KAWASAKI

12th -DJ KENTA

19th - HIROKO OTSUKA

26th - DJ TOJO

August 2024

2nd - DJ KAWASAKI

9th - DJ TOJO

16th - DJ KENTA

23rd - DJ KAWASAKI

30th - DJ KENTA

About DJ KENTA (performs on July 12th, August 16th and 30th)

DJ KENTA's seamless and groovy playing style, weaving together tracks from various genres as if on a single thread, has made him a truly "danceable" DJ. He has performed in New York, Asia, and at major brand parties, hotels, and festivals. He hosts the weekly live broadcast "Abema Mix" on Abema TV's HIP-HOP channel and was selected for the popular program "mynameis," raising expectations for his future activities.

About DJ KAWASAKI (performs on July 5th, August 2nd and 23rd)

DJ KAWASAKI debuted in 2005 when he released a 12-inch single from King Street Records. In 2006 his album 'Beautiful ‘ was release from the major record label Columbia. The singles released from this album made No.1 by eight consecutive tracks on the iTunes Dance Chart. He recently started his own label "KAWASAKI RECORDS". His first release from this will be 'Don't Put My Heart Down' feat Maylee Todd" (HMV record) November 3rd in 2018.He has his resident DJ regular party “MAGNETiC” at his home ground, The Room in Tokyo each and every month.

About DJ HIROKO OTSUKA (performs on July 19th)

With a wealth of DJ career around 25 years, DJ Hiroko Otsuka has performed at the Fuji Rock Festivals and the Tokyo Jazz Festival. She has been a resident DJ at the monthly record session "CHAMP" in Shibuya. Hiroko is also the founder of her own label, "Key of Life+" where she oversees and involves in various music production.

About DJ TOJO (performs on July 26th and August 9th)

TOJO began his career in the early 90’s across Tokyo's clubs, cafes, and live venues. Discovered in 2003 by trumpeter Osada Isao, he became a resident DJ at ‘afrontier’ in Motion Blue Yokohama, collaborating with artists globally. He has performed at the renowned jazz club Blue Note Tokyo, showcasing his versatile sets which span salsa, UK jazz, Latin and more. His DJ style is a crossover that transcends time and space, and excels at creating dramatic and story-driven, evocative playlists.
